short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 你的AI客服助手，具备AI回复、文案优化、内容总结、智能翻译等能力，驱动客户服务效率和质量提升

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI客服助手基于云从科技自研大模型，具备AI回复、文案优化、内容总结、智能翻译等能力，并提供一站式智能客服解决方案，完成全场景联接，驱动企业服务效率和质量提升。
long.zh_CN: The AI ​​customer service assistant is based on a self-developed large model of Cloudwalk Technology. It has capabilities such as AI reply, copywriting optimization, content summary, and intelligent translation. It also provides a one-stop intelligent customer service solution to complete all-scenario connections and drive improvements in enterprise service efficiency and quality.
